alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 07 at 1:54AM CST until March 07 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 153 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Little Bayou Meto Park, or 17 miles north of Dumas, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... White River National Wildlife R... Gillett... St. Charles... Langford... Little Bayou Meto Park... De Witt... Ethel... De Luce... Tichnor... Indian Bay... Reydell... Weber... Sarassa... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
